articles.title: Patriots QB Mac Jones offers explanation for ‘dirty play’ - AL.com
articles.description: The former Alabama All-American said he thought Carolina’s Brian Burns had the football when he took down the defensive end.
articles.content: Carolina outside linebacker Haason Reddick called it a dirty play and Panthers coach Matt Rhule said he thought a penalty should have been called on Sunday. On Monday, Carolina outside linebacker Sha… [+3962 chars]

articles.title: North American stock markets continue record runs after last week's economic gains - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The afterglow of last week's economic and employment gains propelled North American stock markets further along their record runs.
articles.content:
The afterglow of last week's economic and employment gains propelled North American stock markets further along their record runs.
